text: The GR 132 is a long-distance walking route in La Gomera, Canary Islands, Spain. It's part of the extensive GR footpath network of paths, tracks and trails. It's a well marked loop with a starting point in San Sebastián de La Gomera, the island's capital city. GR 132 is about 120-130 kilometres long, depending on the trail's variation. ==External links== * Camino Natural Costas de La Gomera * Actual map (from 2017) * Guide for hiking GR 132 in La Gomera Category:Hiking trails in Spain Category:La Gomera
title: GR 132
